title: abhayAmbA nAyaka harisAyaka
sahitya:
abhayAmbA nAyaka harisAyaka Atma rUpa prakAshaka avAva


anupallavi

 ubhayAtmaka prapanca prakAsha dhInkAra svarUpAvakAshaka 
shubhakara kAvErI tIrasthita sundara gaurI mAyUranAtha


caraNam   nAgalinga bhaktAbhISTaprada nAdabindu kalArUpAspada AgamAdi sannuta 
pallavapada AnandabhairavI yutapada bhOga mOkSa vitaraNa dhurINatara bhUsurAdi 
samsEvita shankara tyAgarAja guruguha sangavakara tApatraya hara dayAsudhAkara
